p:
The proposed model is evaluated by estimating ILI indexes (relative ratio in the US; the absolute patient numbers in Japan). The model produces a one-week forecast from a specific week using the ILI report delayed by one week in each country and GT data in the same week. Given i-th week t
i , the model estimates the ILI rate (in the US case) or the number of ILI patients (in Japan case) after a week.
